item.title: My Setup
item.description: Hardware I am using a Lenovo laptop (Ideapad 110-15AST). It has a 15.6 inch screen and comes with AMD A9 9400, 8 GB of RAM, a 1 TB hard disk. Its a old laptop but it gets the work done. I have a Asus M1 Pro which I just bought mainly for its 5000 mAh Li-Po battery. Software I use both linux and Windows OS. I use Manjaro Linux (bspwm) and Windows 10.
item.content:
Hardware

I am using a Lenovo laptop (Ideapad 110-15AST). It has a 15.6 inch screen and comes with AMD A9 9400, 8 GB of RAM, a 1 TB hard disk. Its a old laptop but it gets the work done.

I have a Asus M1 Pro which I just bought mainly for its 5000 mAh Li-Po battery.

Software

I use both linux and Windows OS. I use Manjaro Linux (bspwm) and Windows 10. I tried many distros and much distro hopping I finally settled on Manjaro Linux. I keep switching distos as there is so many choices with many distro getting nice updates.

My favorite shell to use is zsh. I use Gvim as my primary text editor in Linux and notepad in Windows. I sometime use VS code just to change things up.

My phone has LineageOS running. I had to unlock the bootloader and to get the OS working.
